Package com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller

Class UserProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.ttc.fitPT.ptSchedule.controller.UserProfileController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/api/user") public class UserProfileController extends Object
UserProfileController handles user profile-related operations such as displaying profile information and changing the user's password.

  • Method Details

    • showUserProfilePage

      @GetMapping("/profile") public String showUserProfilePage()
      Displays the user profile page.
      Returns:
      the name of the HTML template for the user profile page.

    • getUserProfileInfo

      @GetMapping("/profile-info") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> getUserProfileInfo(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieves the current user's profile information.
      Parameters:
      session - the current HTTP session containing the user's details.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the user information as a JSON object.

    • changePassword

      @PostMapping("/change-password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> changePassword(@RequestBody Map<String,String> passwordData, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates the user's password or username. Validates the inputs and performs the update.
      Parameters:
      passwordData - a map containing "newUsername" and/or "newPassword".
      session - the current HTTP session to identify the user.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the success or failure of the operation.
